title: DanceDanceRevolution
description: Enjoy non-stop dance party action with Dance Dance Revolution on Xbox 360 console.Battle against friends to claim the arrows in a DANCE OFF.The arrows will go to the dancer with the fastest feet and sharpest timing.Dance to continuous tracks in CLUB MODE.The difficulty level can suddenly switch depending on the player's dance style.The excitement is non-stop, with all sorts of TRICKS waiting to wrong-foot you.With Dance Dance Revolution, you can share the excitement with your friends and family!

childDownloads.title: DanceDanceRevolution Greatest Hits
childDownloads.description: "Dance Dance Revolution" was the first release of the DDR series in 2001. 5 songs from the game have been recorded with new step sequences! Be sure to try out these tracks.  Recorded Songs - PARANOiA / 180 - BRILLIANT 2U / NAOKI - AM-3P / KTz - TRIP MACHINE / DE-SIRE - PUT YOUR FAITH IN ME / UZI-LAY  Please access the website below for the song credits. http://www.konami.com/officialsites/ddr2010/

childDownloads.title: DanceDanceRevolution PREMIUM PACK
childDownloads.description: Celebrating the first release of "DanceDanceRevolution", 3 of the most popular tracks have been selected from the game to provide the full-length version of the songs to you for free!  Recorded Songs - Let's Get Away (Full Version) / NAOKI feat. Brenda Burch - dreaming can make a wish come true (Full Version) / jun & NRG Factory feat. Anna Kaelin - Private Eye (Full Version) / atomsoak ft. cerol  Please access the website below for the song credits. http://www.konami.com/officialsites/ddr2010/
